short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the users to change the background in pink color of the current page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: You can now change your background color of your visited webpage. Just 2 clicks and you will have pink background.
